home_page.bottleneck: Hero section LCP image (DoctorCard) was using a 1.3MB high-res original source file, causing unnecessary processing overhead and risk of slow load on cache miss.
home_page.optimization: Resized source image to 400x400px (21KB) to match display requirements.

location_pages.bottleneck: Google Maps iframe was loading immediately (even with lazy loading), causing TBT and bandwidth usage issues.

changes.impact: Reduced LCP source file size by ~98%. Eliminates heavy server-side image optimization overhead for the hero image.

verification.manual_check: Inspect the doctor image in the hero section. Verify it loads instantly and is the correct resolution.
